leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

unit.unit_name: 数据格式/读取/预处理与质控

tools.name: loupeR
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat objects to 10x Genomics Loupe Browser files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight R package designed to convert Seurat objects into .cloupe files, enabling visualization and analysis of single-cell data within the 10x Genomics Loupe Browser.

tools.name: AnnSQL
tools.one_line_profile: SQL-based query interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables SQL-based querying directly on AnnData objects, facilitating complex data filtering and retrieval operations for single-cell datasets.

tools.name: PiGx scRNAseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analysis of Drop-seq single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for processing Drop-seq single-cell RNA-seq data, handling steps from raw reads to expression matrices and quality control reports.

tools.name: scVIDR
tools.one_line_profile: Variational inference model for predicting dose responses in single cells
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Autoencoder (VAE) tool designed to predict gene expression changes in response to chemical perturbations across different cell types in single-cell data.

tools.name: MiCV
tools.one_line_profile: Web-application for scRNA-seq filtering, analysis, and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Python Dash-based web application that allows researchers to upload raw scRNA-seq data for interactive filtering, analysis, and manual annotation without requiring extensive coding skills.

tools.name: ceLLama
tools.one_line_profile: Local LLM-based cell type annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging local Large Language Models (LLMs) for automated cell type annotation in single-cell RNA-seq data, emphasizing privacy and speed.

tools.name: scrna_seurat_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Seurat-based analysis pipeline for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A structured pipeline utilizing the Seurat framework for the comprehensive analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, covering preprocessing to downstream analysis.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Single-cell Analysis Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform and pipeline for the automated analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, providing a user-friendly interface for processing and visualization.

tools.name: Interactive-3D-Plotting-in-Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization tool for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: R code and utilities to generate interactive 3D UMAP and tSNE plots from Seurat-analyzed single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: gssnng
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Set Scoring on the Nearest Neighbor Graph
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing gene set scoring on single-cell RNA-seq data using the nearest neighbor graph structure within AnnData objects.

tools.name: sc-atacseq-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tool for single cell ATAC-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing utility for single-cell ATAC-Seq data, designed to prepare data for visualization and analysis in single cell explorer tools.

tools.name: DoubletDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection in single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for detecting doublets (technical artifacts where two cells are sequenced as one) in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ALRA
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptively-thresholded Low-Rank Approximation for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A method for imputation of missing values in single-cell RNA-seq data using low-rank approximation, helping to recover true biological signals from sparse data.

tools.name: MAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Markov Affinity-based Graph Imputation of Cells
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for imputing missing values in high-dimensional data, particularly single-cell RNA-seq, by sharing information across similar cells to restore data structure.

tools.name: FastCAR
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Correction of Ambient RNA
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to remove ambient RNA contamination from droplet-based single-cell sequencing data, improving the accuracy of downstream analysis.

tools.name: Scasat
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell ATAC-seq preprocessing and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A complete pipeline for the preprocessing and analysis of single-cell ATAC-seq data, facilitating the study of chromatin accessibility at the single-cell level.

tools.name: alphapepttools
tools.one_line_profile: Biological interpretation tools for proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A library for the biological interpretation of proteomics data, designed to be agnostic to the search and quantification engine used.

tools.name: DropletUtils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for handling droplet-based single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package providing utilities for handling, processing, and analyzing droplet-based single-cell data, including empty droplet detection and barcode swapping correction.

tools.name: EmptyDropsMultiome
tools.one_line_profile: Empty droplet detection for multiome datasets
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the EmptyDrops method specifically tailored for detecting and removing empty droplets in multi-omics (RNA + ATAC) single-cell datasets.

tools.name: sobolev_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Sobolev alignment of deep probabilistic models for single cell profiles
tools.detailed_description: A method for aligning single-cell profiles using Sobolev alignment of deep probabilistic models, facilitating the comparison and integration of datasets.

tools.name: scMiko
tools.one_line_profile: R package for scRNA-seq analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: An R package built on the Seurat framework offering a collection of analytic workflows and visualization tools for single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: scAR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for ambient signal removal
tools.detailed_description: scAR (single-cell Ambient Remover) uses deep learning to model and remove ambient RNA signals in droplet-based single-cell omics data, distinguishing real signals from background noise.

tools.name: CyteType
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent LLM driven cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool utilizing multi-agent Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform automated cell type annotation on single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CyteTypeR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for CyteType cell annotation
tools.detailed_description: The R implementation/interface for the CyteType tool, enabling multi-agent LLM-driven cell type annotation within R workflows.

tools.name: MuDataSeurat
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for .h5mu files in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to read and write .h5mu (MuData) files directly into Seurat objects, facilitating multi-omics data interoperability.

tools.name: APackOfTheClones
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of clonal expansion via circle-packing
tools.detailed_description: An R package extending scRepertoire to visualize clonal expansion in single-cell data using circle-packing layouts, providing an intuitive view of clone sizes.

tools.name: DoubleThreshold
tools.one_line_profile: Double Threshold algorithm for brain connectivity
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Double Threshold (DDT) algorithm for identifying significant functional connections in neuronal networks, filtering out noise in connectivity matrices.

tools.name: ACTINN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ACTINN for cell type identification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the ACTINN (Automatic Cell-Types Identification using Neural Networks) method for classifying cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: drug2cell
tools.one_line_profile: Gene group activity utility functions for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility for Scanpy that facilitates the analysis of drug targets or other gene groups within single-cell data, mapping drug interactions to cell types.

tools.name: scanpy_recipes
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregated analysis functions for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generalized and aggregated analysis recipes and functions for working with AnnData and Scanpy, standardizing common workflows.

tools.name: scImpute
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and robust imputation method for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method to accurately and robustly impute the dropout values in scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: bayNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian normalization for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: bayNorm is an R package for normalizing single-cell RNA-seq data using a Bayesian approach to infer true counts.

tools.name: scIBD
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection tool for scCAS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for detecting doublets in single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scCAS) data.

tools.name: treedata
tools.one_line_profile: AnnData extension for tree-structured data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends the AnnData format to support tree-structured data, facilitating hierarchical analysis in single-cell genomics.

tools.name: scCATCH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic annotation of cell types for scRNA-seq clusters
tools.detailed_description: An R package for automatic annotation of cell types of clusters from single-cell RNA sequencing data based on evidence-based score.

tools.name: SCopeLoomR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for Loom files compatible with SCope
tools.detailed_description: R package to create generic .loom files and extend them with other data such as SCENIC regulons, Seurat clusters and markers, compatible with the SCope viewer.

tools.name: SpatialNF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nextflow pipelines for processing spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: dropseqRunner
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing droplet-based scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight pipeline for processing droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data, handling alignment and quantification.

tools.name: ddqc
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven quality control for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised, data-driven quality control method for single-cell RNA-seq that retains cell types that might be lost by standard fixed-threshold filtering.

tools.name: CpG_Me
tools.one_line_profile: WGBS pipeline for alignment and QC of DNA methylation
tools.detailed_description: A whole genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) pipeline that processes raw reads (FastQ) to CpG count matrices, including alignment and QC.

tools.name: SCeptre
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for multiplexed single-cell proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package extending Scanpy to analyze multiplexed single-cell proteomics data, handling specific normalization and QC needs.

tools.name: SgsAnnDataV2
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat/Giotto/Signac/ArchR to AnnData
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to convert analysis objects from Seurat, Giotto, Signac, and ArchR into the AnnData format for interoperability.

tools.name: anndata-mcp
tools.one_line_profile: MCP interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A tool allowing retrieval of information about AnnData objects via the Model Context Protocol (MCP), facilitating integration with LLMs or other MCP-compliant systems.

tools.name: CellBender
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for removing technical artifacts from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A software package for eliminating technical artifacts (like ambient RNA/background noise) from high-throughput single-cell RNA sequencing data using deep generative models.

tools.name: pytometry_legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for flow and mass cytometry
tools.detailed_description: Extends the Scanpy framework to handle preprocessing and analysis of flow and mass cytometry data.

tools.name: mLLMCelltype
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-LLM consensus framework for cell annotation
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging multiple Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform accurate consensus-based cell type annotation for single-cell data.

tools.name: proatac
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for scATAC-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline designed for processing single-cell ATAC-seq data.

tools.name: solo
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection for scRNA-seq using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting doublets in single-cell RNA-seq data, often used in conjunction with scVI.

tools.name: scruff
tools.one_line_profile: Single Cell RNA-seq UMI Filtering Facilitator
tools.detailed_description: An R package for processing single-cell RNA-seq FASTQ files, performing alignment, UMI filtering, and generating count matrices.

tools.name: Circe
tools.one_line_profile: Co-accessibility network inference from scATAC-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for inferring co-accessibility networks from single-cell ATAC-seq data, based on the Cicero algorithm but implemented for AnnData.

tools.name: GRnnData
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Regulatory Network enhanced AnnData toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for handling and analyzing Gene Regulatory Networks (GRNs) within the AnnData framework.

tools.name: Seurat-Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Seurat integration methods
tools.detailed_description: An R package expanding integrative analysis capabilities of Seurat by providing seamless access to popular integration methods and benchmarking tools.

tools.name: sceasy
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for single-cell data formats
tools.detailed_description: A package to facilitate conversion between different single-cell data formats (e.g., Seurat, AnnData, Loom, SingleCellExperiment).

tools.name: DoubletFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection in scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for predicting doublets in single-cell RNA sequencing data using artificial nearest neighbors.

tools.name: bollito
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis.

tools.name: epiScanpy
tools.one_line_profile: Epigenomics Single Cell Analysis in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for the analysis of single-cell epigenomics data (scATAC-seq, scDNA methylation), built on top of Scanpy.

tools.name: pytximport
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of tximport for gene count estimation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the R tximport package, used for summarizing transcript-level estimates for gene-level analysis.

tools.name: SoupX
tools.one_line_profile: Removal of cell-free mRNA from droplet scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package to quantify and remove ambient RNA (soup) contamination from droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: Seurat (CV)
tools.one_line_profile: 3D reconstruction from moving points to depth
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Seurat: From Moving Points to Depth', a computer vision tool for depth estimation. (Note: Name collision with bioinformatics tool Seurat).

tools.name: grassp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Analysis of Subcellular/Spatial Proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for graph-based analysis of subcellular and spatial proteomics data.

tools.name: protdata
tools.one_line_profile: Proteomics data loader for AnnData
tools.detailed_description: A dataloader tool to convert common proteomics search engine outputs into the AnnData format for downstream analysis.

tools.name: gficf
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Frequency - Inverse Cell Frequency normalization
tools.detailed_description: An R implementation of the GF-ICF method for normalizing single-cell data, analogous to TF-IDF in text processing.

tools.name: rPanglaoDB
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for PanglaoDB single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package to download and merge labeled single-cell RNA-seq data from the PanglaoDB database directly into Seurat objects.

tools.name: anndata (R)
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for the AnnData format
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the Python AnnData package, allowing manipulation of annotated multivariate observation data in R.

tools.name: r-seurat-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: CLI scripts for Seurat workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts wrapping Seurat functionality for use in command-line workflows (e.g., Bioconda, Galaxy).

tools.name: scanpy-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: CLI scripts for Scanpy workflows
tools.detailed_description: Scripts for using Scanpy via command line, facilitating integration into workflow managers like Nextflow or Galaxy.

tools.name: scanpy-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow leveraging scanpy-scripts to run scalable single-cell analysis pipelines.

tools.name: SCpubr
tools.one_line_profile: Publication-ready visualizations for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package to generate high-quality, publication-ready visualizations for single-cell transcriptomics data, streamlining plotting workflows.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses (DEA) on single-cell data using Seurat.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen analysis with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing perturbation analyses of pooled CRISPR screens with scRNA-seq readout using Seurat's Mixscape.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for scRNA-seq processing with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing and visualizing single-cell RNA-seq data (10X or MTX) using Seurat.

tools.name: SGS
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly browser for visualizing single-cell and spatial multiomics data
tools.detailed_description: SGS is a collaborative and versatile browser designed for the visualization of single-cell and spatial multiomics data, facilitating interactive exploration of complex biological datasets.

tools.name: anndictionary
tools.one_line_profile: Python package to conveniently process a dictionary of AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: Anndictionary provides utilities to handle collections of AnnData objects, simplifying batch processing and management of multiple single-cell datasets in Python.

tools.name: miQC
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible, probabilistic metrics for quality control of scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: miQC provides a data-driven approach to quality control for single-cell RNA-seq data, using probabilistic models to jointly model the proportion of mitochondrial reads and the number of detected genes.

tools.name: PieParty
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to represent each cell in UMAP plots as a pie chart
tools.detailed_description: PieParty allows for the visualization of single-cell data by representing individual cells or clusters as pie charts within UMAP embeddings, useful for displaying multi-modal or compositional data per cell.

tools.name: hv-anndata
tools.one_line_profile: Holoviz interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: hv-anndata provides an interface between AnnData objects and the HoloViz ecosystem, enabling interactive and high-performance visualization of large-scale single-cell data.

tools.name: infercnvpy
tools.one_line_profile: Infer copy number variation (CNV) from scRNA-seq data in Python
tools.detailed_description: Infercnvpy is a Python package designed to infer copy number variations (CNV) from single-cell RNA-seq data, fully integrated with the Scanpy ecosystem for seamless analysis.

tools.name: anndata.js
tools.one_line_profile: AnnData implementation for the browser (JavaScript/TypeScript)
tools.detailed_description: anndata.js is a TypeScript library that brings the AnnData data structure to the browser, enabling web-based tools to read, write, and manipulate single-cell data formats directly on the client side.

tools.name: MuData
tools.one_line_profile: MuData-compatible storage for Bioconductor's MultiAssayExperiment
tools.detailed_description: This R package provides functionality to interact with MuData (Multimodal Data) formats, bridging the gap between Python's MuData and R's MultiAssayExperiment ecosystems for multimodal analysis.

tools.name: cellxgene_VIP
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization in Plugin (VIP) for cellxgene
tools.detailed_description: cellxgene_VIP is a plugin for the cellxgene viewer that extends its capabilities to generate high-resolution publication-ready plots (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and perform differential expression analysis directly within the interface.

tools.name: SCISSORS
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter optimization for reclustering cell groups in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: SCISSORS optimizes parameter selection for Louvain graph-based clustering within the Seurat framework, specifically designed to help identify rare cell types by refining reclustering strategies.

tools.name: ggSCvis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing SingleCell data using ggplot2
tools.detailed_description: ggSCvis is an R package that provides a set of functions based on ggplot2 to simplify and enhance the visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: dropEst
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for initial analysis of droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: dropEst is a high-performance pipeline for processing droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data (e.g., 10x Genomics, inDrop), handling alignment, UMI counting, and quality control to generate count matrices.

tools.name: orthomap
tools.one_line_profile: Python package to extract orthologous maps and calculate evolutionary indices
tools.detailed_description: orthomap extracts orthologous maps from OrthoFinder/eggNOG results and calculates weighted expression data (transcriptome evolutionary index) for single-cell RNA sequencing objects.

tools.name: Juscan.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell data analysis toolkit built with Julia
tools.detailed_description: Juscan.jl is a single-cell data analysis toolkit developed in Julia, inspired by Scanpy, offering high-performance processing and analysis capabilities for scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Cirrocumulus is a visualization tool designed to bring single-cell data to life, supporting large-scale datasets and providing interactive exploration capabilities in the browser.

tools.name: addImg2annData
tools.one_line_profile: Add images to StereoSeq/Stomics spatial data and convert formats
tools.detailed_description: This tool facilitates the addition of image data to StereoSeq/Stomics spatial transcriptomics datasets and supports generating Seurat RDS and Scanpy h5ad files.

tools.name: normalisr
tools.one_line_profile: Causal inference, differential expression, and co-expression for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: Normalisr is a Python package for normalization and analysis of scRNA-seq data, focusing on causal inference, differential expression, and co-expression network analysis.

tools.name: mapscvi
tools.one_line_profile: Map single cell expression data into a reference scvi latent space
tools.detailed_description: mapscvi allows mapping of new single-cell expression data into an existing reference scVI latent space and UMAP using R and Seurat, facilitating data integration and projection.

tools.name: scVI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for fitting VAEs to single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: scVI.jl is a Julia implementation of the scVI (single-cell Variational Inference) model, using count distributions to fit Variational Autoencoders to single-cell data.

tools.name: SignacX
tools.one_line_profile: Cell Type Identification and Discovery for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: SignacX is an R package designed for the identification and discovery of cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data, leveraging neural networks for classification.

tools.name: slide_snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for spatial transcriptomics preprocessing and QC
tools.detailed_description: slide_snake is a Snakemake pipeline for the preprocessing, alignment, quality control, and quantification of spatial transcriptomics data, supporting both short-read and long-read technologies.

tools.name: metaspace-converter
tools.one_line_profile: Convert METASPACE datasets to AnnData or SpatialData formats
tools.detailed_description: A utility to download and convert datasets from METASPACE (spatial metabolomics) into common single-cell and spatial formats like AnnData or SpatialData for downstream analysis.

tools.name: cafe
tools.one_line_profile: Cell Analyzer for Flow Experiment
tools.detailed_description: CAFE (Cell Analyzer for Flow Experiment) is a Python tool for analyzing flow cytometry data, which is closely related to single-cell analysis workflows.

tools.name: ReductionWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: R wrappers for Python dimensional reduction tools
tools.detailed_description: ReductionWrappers provides R wrappers to interface with Python-based dimensional reduction tools, allowing them to be used seamlessly with R single-cell objects like Seurat and SingleCellExperiment.

tools.name: scRNAimputeR
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scRNA imputation methods for R
tools.detailed_description: scRNAimputeR aims to collect various scRNA-seq imputation methods and provide interfaces to common R single-cell libraries like Seurat and SingleCellAssay.

tools.name: seurat-disk
tools.one_line_profile: Interfaces for HDF5-based Single Cell File Formats in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: SeuratDisk provides support for on-disk storage of single-cell datasets using HDF5-based formats (like h5Seurat and AnnData), enabling analysis of datasets larger than memory within the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: ArchR-h5ad
tools.one_line_profile: Parse ArchR arrow files to AnnData h5ad format
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert ArchR Arrow files (used for single-cell ATAC-seq analysis) into AnnData h5ad format, facilitating interoperability between ArchR and Python-based tools like Scanpy.

tools.name: torch-adata
tools.one_line_profile: Create PyTorch Datasets from AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: torch-adata simplifies the process of creating PyTorch Dataset objects directly from AnnData files, streamlining the pipeline for deep learning applications on single-cell data.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: NASQAR is a comprehensive web-based platform that offers a suite of tools for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput sequencing data, including bulk and single-cell RNA-seq.

tools.name: SeuratWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based wizard for guided Seurat analysis
tools.detailed_description: SeuratWizard is an interactive web application that guides users through the single-cell RNA-seq analysis workflow using Seurat, making the analysis accessible to users without extensive coding experience.

tools.name: Seurat v3 Wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based interactive wizard for guided single-cell RNA-seq analysis using Seurat v3
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive application designed to perform guided single-cell RNA-seq data analysis and clustering based on the Seurat v3 workflow. It provides a wizard-style interface to facilitate the analysis process without requiring extensive coding.

tools.name: BurgerTools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scRNA-seq gating and analysis tools extending Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A bundle of useful single-cell RNA-seq gating tools that extend the functionality of Seurat. It includes utilities for cell selection and filtering based on expression thresholds.

tools.name: adpbulk
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for performing pseudobulking on AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform pseudobulking on single-cell data stored in AnnData objects, aggregating cell-level data into group-level profiles.

tools.name: anntools
tools.one_line_profile: CLI-driven toolkit for manipulating AnnData files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface toolkit for interacting with and manipulating AnnData objects, facilitating file handling and basic operations without writing Python scripts.

tools.name: scRNA-Seq-TCC-prep
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing scripts for single-cell RNA-Seq data (TCC matrices)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of notebooks and scripts for preprocessing single-cell RNA-Seq data, specifically focusing on Transcript Compatibility Counts (TCC). Note: Marked as deprecated but historically a tool.

tools.name: ALRA
tools.one_line_profile: Imputation method for scRNA-seq using low-rank approximation
tools.detailed_description: Adaptively-thresholded Low Rank Approximation (ALRA) is a method for imputation of missing values in single-cell RNA-seq data, recovering true biological signals from technical noise.

tools.name: scDblFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection methods for single-cell sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods for detecting doublets (two cells captured as one) in single-cell sequencing data, improving downstream analysis quality.

tools.name: RADO
tools.one_line_profile: Robust and accurate doublet detection via maximizing AUPRC
tools.detailed_description: A tool for robust and accurate single-cell sequencing doublet detection that works by maximizing the Area Under the Precision-Recall Curve (AUPRC).

tools.name: ascend
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Single Cell Expression, Normalization and Differential expression
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis of single-cell expression data, including functions for normalization, quality control, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: BANKSY
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for spatial transcriptomics analysis that provides a spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation.

tools.name: scplotter
tools.one_line_profile: R package for easy visualization of single-cell sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package built upon plotthis that provides a set of functions to visualize single-cell sequencing data efficiently.

tools.name: DeepSpot
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics prediction from H&E images
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging spatial context for enhanced spatial transcriptomics prediction directly from H&E stained histology images.

tools.name: precellar
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Single-Cell Genomics Preprocessing package
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based package designed for high-performance preprocessing of single-cell genomics data.

tools.name: iCellR
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive R package for analysis of high-throughput single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R package designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of high-throughput single-cell sequencing data, supporting scRNA-seq, scVDJ-seq, scATAC-seq, CITE-Seq, and Spatial Transcriptomics.

tools.name: SCnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization method for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data, accounting for the dependence of count data on sequencing depth.

tools.name: pySCTransform
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of SCTransform normalization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to perform normalization and variance-stabilization of single-cell data, porting the functionality of Seurat's SCTransform to Python.

tools.name: scCustomize
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for visualization and analysis of single-cell data in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package containing a collection of functions created and curated to aid in the visualization and analysis of single-cell data, complementing standard workflows.

tools.name: Azimuth
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for reference-based mapping of single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny web application and R package for mapping single-cell datasets to reference atlases using Seurat v4 technology, enabling automated cell type annotation.

tools.name: Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive R toolkit for single cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R toolkit for single cell genomics, designed for QC, analysis, and exploration of single cell RNA-seq data. It enables users to identify and interpret sources of heterogeneity from single cell transcriptomic measurements, and to integrate diverse types of single cell data.

tools.name: SeuratData
tools.one_line_profile: Mechanism for distributing datasets for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the distribution and loading of datasets for use with the Seurat package, streamlining access to benchmark and tutorial datasets.

tools.name: SeuratWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Community-provided extensions and wrappers for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A collection of community-provided extensions and wrappers that integrate other single-cell analysis tools directly into the Seurat workflow.

tools.name: sc-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions and templates for Scanpy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of project templates and useful functions for single-cell data analysis with Scanpy, aiming to streamline common analysis tasks.

tools.name: Muon.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal omics analysis framework for Julia
tools.detailed_description: The Julia implementation of the Muon framework, designed for the analysis of multimodal single-cell omics data.

tools.name: annbatch
tools.one_line_profile: Minibatch loading for on-disk AnnData files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for efficient minibatch loading of on-disk AnnData files, facilitating the training of machine learning models on large single-cell datasets.

tools.name: AnnData
tools.one_line_profile: Annotated data structure for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a scalable way to handle annotated data matrices, serving as the core data structure for the scverse ecosystem and Scanpy.

tools.name: anndataR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides interoperability with Python's AnnData objects, allowing R users to read, write, and manipulate AnnData files.

tools.name: MuData
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Data (.h5mu) implementation for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing the MuData format for multimodal omics data, allowing storage and manipulation of multiple modalities in a single object.

tools.name: Muon
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal omics analysis framework for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for the analysis of multimodal single-cell omics data, built on top of MuData and integrating with the scverse ecosystem.

tools.name: rapids_singlecell
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated framework for scRNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides GPU-accelerated functions for single-cell RNA-seq analysis, leveraging NVIDIA RAPIDS to speed up processing of large datasets.

tools.name: Scanpy
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable single-cell analysis toolkit in Python
tools.detailed_description: A scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data. It includes preprocessing, visualization, clustering, pseudotime and trajectory inference, and differential expression testing.

tools.name: scirpy
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for single-cell TCR and BCR analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends Scanpy to analyze single-cell T-cell receptor (TCR) and B-cell receptor (BCR) repertoires.

tools.name: scvi-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep probabilistic modeling of single-cell and spatial omics data, providing implementations of various scVI models for integration, annotation, and differential expression.

tools.name: shadows
tools.one_line_profile: Shadow objects for AnnData and MuData
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing 'shadow' objects for AnnData and MuData, enabling efficient handling of data that doesn't fit in memory or requires lazy loading.

tools.name: simple-scvi
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified implementation of scVI
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and simplified implementation of the scVI model for single-cell data analysis, intended for educational purposes or lightweight integration.

tools.name: convert2anndata
tools.one_line_profile: R package to convert SingleCellExperiment and Seurat objects to AnnData
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to convert SingleCellExperiment and Seurat objects into Python's AnnData format as comprehensively as possible, facilitating interoperability.

tools.name: scranPY
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of scran normalization
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the scran computeSumFactors method (normalization by deconvolution) for single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

tools.name: scvis
tools.one_line_profile: Dimension reduction method for high-dimensional biological data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for dimension reduction of high-dimensional biological data, specifically designed to preserve local and global structure in single-cell data visualization.

tools.name: mousipy
tools.one_line_profile: Ortholog mapping tool for converting mouse to human gene symbols
tools.detailed_description: Translates an AnnData object with mouse gene symbols into one with human gene symbols by mapping orthologs from biomart, facilitating cross-species integration.

tools.name: tidygate
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive gating and labeling tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Allows users to label elements within drawn gates interactively, bridging the gap between programmatic analysis and manual gating in cytometry and single-cell data.

tools.name: tidyseurat
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse-style interface for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: Provides a tidyverse-compatible interface for Seurat objects, allowing users to manipulate single-cell data using familiar dplyr verbs and pipes.

tools.name: Scrublet
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection method for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for detecting doublets in single-cell RNA-seq data by simulating doublets from the observed data and training a classifier.

tools.name: DRVI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep disentangled representation learning for single-cell omics
tools.detailed_description: A framework for unsupervised deep disentangled representation learning of single-cell omics data, aiming to separate biological variation from technical noise.

tools.name: anndata2ri
tools.one_line_profile: Converter between AnnData and SingleCellExperiment
tools.detailed_description: Facilitates interoperability between Python (AnnData) and R (SingleCellExperiment) ecosystems for single-cell analysis.

tools.name: DCA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Count Autoencoder for denoising scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based autoencoder approach to denoise and impute single-cell RNA-seq data, accounting for zero-inflation and overdispersion.

tools.name: NCEM
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Cell Embeddings for learning cell communication
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework for learning cell communication and spatial dependencies from spatial omics data.

tools.name: kmtricks
tools.one_line_profile: Modular k-mer counting and Bloom filter construction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for efficient k-mer counting and Bloom filter construction from large read collections, useful for alignment-free sequence analysis.

tools.name: Seurat.utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for Seurat v5 analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions and utilities to enhance and streamline single-cell analysis workflows using Seurat.

tools.name: DALI
tools.one_line_profile: TCR/BCR analysis in the Seurat ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: An R package for integrating and analyzing single-cell T-cell and B-cell receptor (TCR/BCR) profiling data within the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: ADTnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization method for CITE-seq ADT data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for normalizing cell surface protein measurements (ADT) in CITE-seq data to facilitate data integration across batches and studies.

tools.name: SCP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive single-cell analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end pipeline designed to facilitate comprehensive analysis, visualization, and exploration of single-cell data, integrating various standard steps.
